env HOME=$WORK/home
! gobin -p github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module
! stdout .+
stderr '^github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module@v1.0.0: main package is not part of a module$'

cd repo
! gobin -m -p github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module
! stdout .+
stderr '^github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module@v1.0.0: main package is not part of a module$'

-- repo/go.mod --
module example.com/repo
